name: Roland Deschain
description: The last Gunslinger and the protagonist of the series.

name: Eddie Dean
description: A troubled heroin addict from New York who becomes a loyal gunslinger.

name: Susannah Dean
description: Originally Odetta Holmes and Detta Walker; she becomes a fierce member of the ka-tet.

name: Jake Chambers
description: A boy from New York who plays a crucial role in Roland’s quest.

name: Oy
description: A billy-bumbler who is fiercely loyal to Jake and the ka-tet.

name: The Man in Black
description: A powerful sorcerer and antagonist who takes many names and forms.

name: Sheemie Ruiz
description: A simple-minded boy with powerful psychic abilities (a Breaker).

name: Father Callahan
description: A priest from 'Salem's Lot' who joins Roland’s quest in later books.

name: Mordred Deschain
description: Roland’s son, born of both human and demonic origin, who threatens the quest.

name: Stephen King
description: The author himself appears as a character, playing a meta role in the story.
